text: traditional on-premises network setups
require high levels of attention and
time to manage and validate aws
networking solutions give you back your
time by reducing network complexity
improving security posture and providing
you with the tools needed to monitor
your network traffic
get started by launching an amazon
virtual private cloud or vpc
you can easily select subnets ip ranges
route tables and security groups you
spend less time managing and verifying
your network and more time building your
applications
you can also use vpc flow logs or
traffic mirroring to gain operational
visibility detect network and security
anomalies and troubleshoot issues
to meet your security needs amazon vpc
provides advanced security features
allowing you to perform inbound and
outbound filtering
and to secure your network connection
while keeping your traffic on the aws
network you can use aws private link
private link establishes a private and
secure connectivity between aws services
and your vpcs
aws networking solutions scale is needed
even if you have tens or hundreds of
vpcs aws transit gateway helps route all
traffic to and from each vpc and
provides you with a central console to
monitor your connections
start building a strong foundation today
with aws networking solutions
